title: The Brooks Cambium x 2021 Chris King Open House Limited Edition Saddles
content: With todayâ€™s coverage from the 2021 Chris King Open House comes a few limited products. The first is this Brooks Cambium, built with anodized turquoise rivets. These saddles are available in standard and carved Cambium saddles in C17 and C15 on BrooksEngland.com.
author: prolly
